Info.Title: A Good Day to Die Hard
Info.Writer: Skip Woods, Roderick Thorp (certain original characters by)
Info.Actors: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead
Info.Plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.
